author: Casey Newton
title: The US government should disclose how it’s using location data to fight the coronavirus
description: There’s a good case for using smartphone data in the COVID-19 response, but Americans deserve an explanation.  A private sector approach from Google and Apple may be more palatable
content:
Filed under:
Theres a good case for using smartphone data in the COVID-19 response, but Americans deserve an explanation
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
